code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{addBook}from"../api/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddBookPage=()=>{const[bookData,setBookData]=useState({book_name:"",author:"",book_type:"",edition:"",book_id:""});const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const bookTypes=["Education","Novel","Fun Reading","Bed Time","History","Comic","Magazines","Architecture","Socio-Work","Others"];const handleChange=e=>{setBookData({...bookData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const response=await addBook(bookData);setMessage(response.message||response.error);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a New Book \uD83D\uDCD8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",gap:"10px",width:"400px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"book_name",placeholder:"Book Name",onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{padding:"8px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"author",placeholder:"Author",onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{padding:"8px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"book_type",onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{padding:"8px",fontSize:"14px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Book Type"}),bookTypes.map((type,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:type,children:type},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"edition",placeholder:"Edition (e.g., III)",onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{padding:"8px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"book_id",placeholder:"Book ID (e.g., YYMMDDID)",onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{padding:"8px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{padding:"8px",backgroundColor:"#007BFF",color:"white",border:"outset",cursor:"pointer"},children:"Add Book"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default AddBookPage;
